name: ATOM8SmartHomes
0:
”Alexa, turn off bathroom”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom lights”
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill lets your control Atom8 devices using Alexa voice. You will be required to use the same credentials that were used when you signed into the Atom8 Smart Homes app to use your devices. Once you login using the credentials you can turn on or turn off you smart home device by saying "Alexa, turn on Bedroom Light"
